page.title: 06Biography - Father A. George
page.content: At our school, St. Margaret's we have a priest called Father George. He has been a priest for 25 years. He is the vicar of St. Margaret's Church, which is Church of England. He used to work in a timber yard before he became a priest. He felt he had to become a priest so he did. He visits the sick, elderly and poor people. He needs to collect money for the poor, Churches overseas, and schools. He has been coming to teach at our school for 14 years. It takes one to one and a half hours to prepare a sermon. Not a lot of people go to church. In his spare time he makes models of trains and he likes reading. On his day off, if it is nice, he goes out somewhere but when it is unpleasant he makes some models.
